summary: The voice of a new generation rocks and rhymes as Palestinian rappers form alternative voices of resistance within the Israeli-Palestinian struggle.
cast: Tamer Nafar|Suhell Nafar|Mahmoud Jreri|Mahmud Shalaby|Mohammed Al Farra|Motaz Alhweihi|Mahmoud Fayad|Nahwa Abed Al'Al|Safaa Hathot|Abeer Al Zinati|Alaa Bishara|Adi Krayem|Anan Kseem|Ibrahim Abu Rahala|Jacqueline Reem Salloum
keywords: dam|palestine|middle east conflict|palestinean hip hop|arabic rap
director: Director: Jacqueline Reem Salloum (as Jackie Reem Salloum)
title: Slingshot Hip Hop
